name: AniCom
description: Compare anime and keep the chain going! Each round gives you a challenge like 'choose an anime with a higher score' or 'choose one from the same studio'. Your choice becomes the next comparison target. Each anime can only be used once - how many rounds can you survive?

achievements.title: First Comparison
achievements.description: Complete your first round in AniCom.

achievements.title: Getting Warmed Up
achievements.description: Reach 5 rounds in a single game.

achievements.title: Perfect Ten
achievements.description: Reach 10 rounds in a single game.

achievements.title: Chain Master
achievements.description: Reach 20 rounds in a single game.

achievements.title: Genre Expert
achievements.description: Successfully match anime by genre 10 times.

achievements.title: Studio Guru
achievements.description: Successfully match anime by studio 10 times.
